resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0ae9-5104-43c0-25f5-bc2e9a698daa#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Burgundi Mária Mestere: Burgundi Mária hóráskönyve.</string>
            <string language="en">Master of Burgundy Maria: Burgundy Maria's Book of Hours </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meister von Burgunder Maria: Burgunder 
Maria Buch von Stunden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maître de Bourgogne Maria : Livre de 
Bourgogne Maria des heures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mestre de Borgonha Maria: Livro de Borgonha
Maria das horas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Supervisore di Borgogna Maria: Libro della 
Borgogna Maria delle ore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύριος burgundy Μαρία: Burgundy Μαρίας 
βιβλίο των ωρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amo de Borgoña Maria: Libro de Borgoña 
Maria de horas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">az olvasó Burgundi Mária mellett gótikus templomtér tárul fel.</string>
            <string language="en">Gothic temple-square appears next to the reading Burgundy Maria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">flamand,  késő középkor,  céh,  Miksa császár,  Burgundi Mária,  hóráskönyv,  Szűz Mária a gyermekkel,  gótikus,  illuminátor,  naturalisztikus,  </string>
            <string language="en">Flemish, late Middle Ages, guild, Emperor Maximilian, Burgundy Maria, Book of Hours, Madonna with the Child, Gothic, illuminator, naturalistic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gotisches Bügel-Quadrat erscheint nahe bei dem 
Messwert Burgunder Maria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La temple-place gothique apparaît à côté de la
lecture Bourgogne Maria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O temple-quadrado gothic aparece ao lado da 
leitura Borgonha Maria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tempiale-quadrato gotico compare vicino alla 
lettura Borgogna Maria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το γοτθικό ναός-τετράγωνο εμφανίζεται δίπλα στην 
ανάγνωση burgundy Μαρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El templo-cuadrado gótico aparece al lado de la 
lectura Borgoña Maria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flämisches, spätes mittleres Alter, Zünft, Kaiser 
Maximilian, Burgunder Maria, Buch von Stunden, Madonna mit dem Kind, 
gotisch, Belichtungseinheit, naturalistisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Âges moyens flamands et défunts, guilde, empereur 
Maximilian, Bourgogne Maria, livre des heures, Madonna avec l'enfant, 
gothique, bloc d'éclairage, naturaliste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idades médias flemish, atrasadas, guild, emperor 
Maximilian, Borgonha Maria, livro das horas, Madonna com a criança, 
gothic, iluminador, naturalistic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Medio Evo fiamminghi e ritardati, cooperativa, imperatore
Maximilian, Borgogna Maria, libro delle ore, Madonna con il bambino, 
gotico, lampadina, naturalistic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φλαμανδικές, πρόσφατες μέσες ηλικίες, συντεχνία, 
αυτοκράτορας Maximilian, burgundy Μαρία, βιβλίο των ωρών, 
Madonna με το παιδί, γοτθικό, φωτιστικό, φυσιοκρατικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edades medias flamencas, últimas, gremio, emperador 
Maximilian, Borgoña Maria, libro de horas, Madonna con el niño, 
gótico, iluminador, naturalistic</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75089</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40cf0ae9-5104-43c0-25f5-bc2e9a698daa&v=1&b=3</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
